name: Snapchat
description: Share moments instantly with fun filters and stories.
longDescription: Snapchat lets you capture and share your life’s moments with creative filters, lenses, and stories. Chat with friends, explore trending content, and stay connected in a fun and interactive way.

name: Honista
description: A modified Instagram app with extra features.
longDescription: Honista is a modded version of Instagram offering enhanced privacy options, media downloads, and advanced customization features not found in the original app.

name: PlayStore
description: Official app marketplace to discover and download Android apps.
longDescription: Google Play Store is the trusted marketplace for Android apps, games, movies, books, and more. It provides millions of apps with verified security and automatic updates.

name: MovieBox
description: Stream and download the latest movies and TV shows.
longDescription: MovieBox allows users to watch and download trending movies and TV shows. With a vast collection of entertainment content, it’s a go-to app for movie lovers.

name: APKPure
description: Download apps and games not available on PlayStore.
longDescription: APKPure provides direct APK downloads for apps and games worldwide. It’s a popular alternative app store that offers region-restricted apps with fast updates.

name: TurboVPN
description: Secure your internet with fast and unlimited VPN access.
longDescription: TurboVPN allows you to browse privately, unblock restricted websites, and enjoy fast, secure internet connections worldwide with just one tap.

name: CapCut Pro
description: Advanced video editing with professional-grade tools.
longDescription: CapCut Pro is an upgraded version of CapCut offering premium features, advanced filters, high-quality exports, and no watermark editing for creators.

name: InstaPro
description: Enhanced Instagram app with privacy and media download features.
longDescription: InstaPro is a popular Instagram mod that allows you to download reels, stories, and posts while providing advanced privacy options and customization features.

name: WhatsApp Red
description: A custom WhatsApp mod with unique themes and features.
longDescription: WhatsApp Red provides extra privacy settings, media sharing options, and exclusive red-themed UI enhancements for a stylish chat experience.

name: WhatsApp Pro
description: A modified WhatsApp with advanced features and customization.
longDescription: WhatsApp Pro offers advanced messaging features, better privacy controls, large file sharing, and enhanced UI customization compared to the official app.

name: YouTube Pro
description: Watch YouTube videos without ads and enjoy premium features.
longDescription: YouTube Pro is a modded version of YouTube that provides ad-free video streaming, background play, and video downloads for an uninterrupted experience.

name: JioHotstar
description: Stream movies, TV shows, and live sports anytime, anywhere.
longDescription: JioHotstar brings you the latest movies, popular TV shows, and live sports streaming in high quality. With a wide content library, it’s one of the most popular entertainment apps in India.
